Name: Red Arcane Robe
Description: Adorned with intricate runes, this crimson robe enhances its wearer's magical prowess and wisdom.

Name: Red Tunic
Description: A well-crafted red tunic, offering comfort while maintaining its wearer's stately appearance

Name: Red Mantle
Description: A resplendent red mantle adorned with protective runes, shielding its wearer against magical attacks

Name: Santa Claus
Description: A joyous red outfit that brings festive cheer and merriment to all who gaze upon it.

Name: Red Doublet
Description: An lavish red doublet, woven with exquisite fabrics and bolstered to provide extra defense

Name: Red Tabard
Description: A regal red tabard, embellished with noble insignias that command respect from its wearer's peers

Name: Red Gambeson
Description: A resilient red gambeson, providing the wearer with improved endurance and lasting protection

Name: Red Surcoat
Description: A stylish red surcoat, offering both flair and an elevated sense of elegance and gallantry

Name: Red Hauberk
Description: A modest red hauberk, providing adequate protection and comfort for its wearer during skirmishes

Name: Red Cuirass
Description: A formidable red cuirass, masterfully forged to enhance its wearer's offensive capabilities

Name: CCCP Forever
Description: A nostalgic outfit that symbolizes unity, resilience, and the unwavering spirit of the people.

Name: Commander Red Caped Armor
Description: Prestigious armor adorned with a regal cape, reserved for commanders known for their valor and leadership.

Name: Red Bra
Description: A bold red undergarment that combines style and support, making it a striking choice for everyday wear.

Name: Red Jupon
Description: A charming red jupon allowing for unrestricted movement, favored by agile combatants and dancers alike

Name: Hobbit Outfit
Description: A cozy and unassuming outfit perfect for hobbits, providing warmth and comfort in their travels.

Name: Hobbit Outfit
Description: A charming red outfit crafted by hobbits, designed for leisurely days and adventurous quests.

Name: Red Brigandine
Description: An impressive red brigandine, reinforced with solid plates to grant its wearer hardiness in battle

Name: Red Cassock
Description: A devout red cassock, perfect for spiritual leaders and those drawn toward a pious existence

Name: Red Vestment
Description: A divine red vestment worn by esteemed clerics, radiating with a magical aura that enhances spellcasting abilities

Name: Red Cotehardie
Description: A fashionable red cotehardie, granting its wearer an air of sophistication and nobility in all social encounters

Name: Red Cryptic Chestplate
Description: A sturdy chestplate etched with occult symbols, providing protection against hostile magic.

Name: Red Ascendant Garb
Description: An ethereal red garment for those who aspire to ascend, offering unmatched agility and grace.

Name: Scarlet Gambeson
Description: A thick gambeson dyed a brilliant scarlet, offering enhanced endurance to its wearer.

Name: Crimson Scale Hauberk
Description: A sturdy scale hauberk dyed a deep crimson, providing reliable defense to its wearer.

Name: Red Winged Demon Plate
Description: A formidable plate armor of red steel, adorned with wings that grant its wearer exceptional attack power.

Name: Burgundy Chainmail
Description: A flexible chainmail vest dyed a deep burgundy, offering basic protection without weighing down its wearer.

Name: Red Dragon Scales
Description: A set of enchanted red dragon scales, known for their magical protection.

Name: Cardinal's Red Armor
Description: A regal suit of red armor worn by a famous cardinal, imbuing its wearer with exceptional ability points.

Name: Blood Red Chain Hauberk
Description: A lightweight chainmail hauberk dyed a vivid blood red, offering increased evasiveness to its wearer.

Name: Ruby Breastplate
Description: A breastplate crafted from shimmering rubies, said to provide a surge of vitality to its wearer.
